mapper.select: SELECT sugang.id_Sugang AS idEnrollment, sugang.id_Student AS idStudent, sugang.id_Cate AS idCate, sugang.id_Pgm AS idPgm, sugang.st_Dt AS stDt, sugang.status AS status, sugang.course_Status AS courseStatus, student.name AS studentName, student.birth AS studentBirth, student.tel AS studentTel, student.address AS studentAddress, student.gender AS studentGender, student.id_User AS studentIdUser, attendance.att_stat AS attendanceStatus, attendance.late_stat AS lateStatus, attendance.abs_stat AS absenceStatus, `user`.email AS userEmail FROM Sugang sugang JOIN Student student ON sugang.id_Student = student.id_Student JOIN Attendance attendance ON sugang.id_Student = attendance.id_Student AND sugang.id_Pgm = attendance.id_pgm JOIN `user` ON student.id_User = `user`.id_User WHERE sugang.id_Pgm = #{idPgm} AND sugang.course_Status = true;
